channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree in need of pruning, 8th August
item.description:
This tree needs pruning. The pavement cannot be used normally anymore because the tree is reaching too far down. Please come and prune it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Trafalgar Road, East Greenwich, London

item.title: Northfield Road EN3 opposite Chester Gardens fly tipped pallet, 8th August
item.description:
A builder who was working in the area left a pallet with advertising in Northfield Road. The builder is no longer working in the area but the pallet is still here. Please remove. Perhaps you can fine the builder for fly tipping? He has also left a similar pallet at the junction of Northfield Road and Southfield Road EN3. Free advertising AND littering! Cheeky!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Northfield Road, Ponders End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parking sign removed on Sansom Street/Harvey Rd, 8th August
item.description:
Parking sign removed and man keeps illegally parking. He continues to either switch his car/van and takes up the parking space, taking it from houseowners on the street with on-street permits.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sansom Street, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter spilled out into the road, 8th August
item.description:
Foxes or other animals have pulled litter out across the road. This is a repeated issue as the bins are not correctly put out by the neighbours for collection, so rubbish is readily available for animals to rummage through

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Hill Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Norwood Road SE27 9AW outside number 216, 8th August
item.description:
Norwood Road SE27 9AW outside number 216 (Deerbrook Surgery) entrance plain (ie unpainted) brick wall graffiti tagged. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture and Google Streetview: https://www.google.com/maps/@51.4384891,-0.1058734,3a,49.1y,232.23h,85.18t/data=!3m8!1e1!3m6!1slSTbskL48fUPLKbzmMN2Sw!2e0!5s20241001T000000!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D4.824685586751599%26panoid%3DlSTbskL48fUPLKbzmMN2Sw%26yaw%3D232.22879728173763!7i16384!8i8192?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDgwNS4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D
